scripts.terminate: wrangler workflows instances terminate schedule latest
scripts.deploy:staging: wrangler secret bulk .staging.vars.json --env staging && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:production: wrangler secret bulk .production.vars.json --env production && wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.terminate:staging: wrangler workflows instances terminate schedule-staging latest --env staging
scripts.terminate:production: wrangler workflows instances terminate schedule-prod latest --env production
scripts.terminate:claim:staging: wrangler workflows instances terminate merkle-claim-staging latest --env staging
scripts.terminate:claim:production: wrangler workflows instances terminate merkle-claim-prod latest --env production
scripts.terminate:parallel:workflow: wrangler workflows instances terminate parallel-prod latest
